Changing UNIX On Call

  1. The old on call documentation

The updated procedure

  1. To change the oncall paging to yourself, Login to pgnmsv01 as yourself. Execute this code,
    1. Set yourself to on call
      oncall=$(whoami)
    2. Copy the paging script to taitc113
      sudo scp /prod/images/scripts/oncallopenviewpaging/${oncall}.Prod_Send_UNIX_admin.sh taitc113:/var/opt/OV/Tenneco/lbin/Prod_Send_UNIX_admin.sh
  2. To redirect on call phone number to yourself, Login to https://voice.google.com
    Username csincus
Password <standard password with a "1" at the end>
    1. Once logged in, check your phone for voice and texts.
